intro: Muscles are the engines of the body. They are divided into three main groups.

hotspots.label: Cardiac Muscle
hotspots.info: Found only in the heart. It works automatically (involuntary) and never gets tired throughout life.

hotspots.label: Involuntary (Smooth) Muscle
hotspots.info: Found in internal organs like the stomach and intestines. They control processes like digestion (peristalsis).

hotspots.label: Voluntary (Skeletal) Muscle
hotspots.info: Attached to bones by tendons. We control these consciously to move, lift, and run.
